K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:217b-11: 'di ltar 'du byed rnams kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas las rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:217b-12: las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag las chos kyi ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad rab tu skyed par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'du byed thams cad la thabs mkhas pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:217b-13: 'di ltar yi ge dha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas yi ge ma zhes bya bas ming dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:217b-14: tshig tu gdags pa'i grogs byas pas chos sna tshogs dang mtshungs par ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:217b-15: yi ge dha dang mas grogs byas pas rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:217b-17: ming med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:217b-18: 'di ltar phyag rgya dpag tu med pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218a-0: chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas rnam @218a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218a-1: par rtog pa thams cad mi dmigs shing rnam par rtog pa yongs su spong bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218a-2: 'di ltar mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas mtha' 'dus pa med cing mtha' yongs su zad par byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rtog pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218a-4: tshig med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218a-5: 'di ltar rang bzhin sna tshogs med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas rang bzhin gcig gis mngon par 'dus byas pas mtshan ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218a-6: rang bzhin sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rab tu sel bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218a-7: 'di ltar 'dun pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas 'dus byas kyi spyod pa mngon du byung ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dag 'dod pa spangs nas rab tu dben par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-0: tshogs pa nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dod pa zad par byed @218b pa'i shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-2: tshogs pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgos chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-6: phyag rgya'i sgo 'dis chos thams cad la rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-8: gzhan yang thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-9: rjes su mthun pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis khong du chud par byas nas rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-11: de la thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-12: tshogs pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-14: nam mkha'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-15: 'di ltar rab tu dben pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:218b-16: 'di ltar rab tu zhi ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu zhi ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219a-0: 'di ltar rnam par phye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas @219a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219a-1: chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams g-yo ba med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o; ;'di ltar gnas pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219a-2: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thob pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219a-3: mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pa sgom pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219a-4: smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu zhi ba'i smon lam gyi snang ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219a-5: 'dod chags med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par rtog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219b-0: skye ba @219b med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219b-2: skye ba med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219b-3: nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phung po yongs su spong ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219b-4: mtshan ma zad par byed pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba zad par byed pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:219b-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs pa la mkhas pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-0: rjes su dran pa med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par rnam par rtog pa med cing mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o; ;ngo bo med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin thams cad yongs su shes pa'i @220a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-2: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-3: 'gog pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-4: blo gros mtha' yas; 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad thogs pa med pa'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-6: rjes su mthun pa'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-7: rtag pa dang chad par lta ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-9: sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' med pa'i sgo yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-10: 'di ltar yongs su skyo bar gyur pa'i phyir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-12: zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-13: bsil bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'di'i rjes su bslab par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-16: chos kyi sgo 'di rnams kyis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-17: chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad rab tu thob par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220a-18: ting nge 'dzin 'di dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-0: chos rnams la @220b thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa yongs su sdud par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'di legs par bsgoms nas chos kyi rgya mtsho'i ting 'dzin thams cad la gnas te chos thams cad la so sor rab tu rtog par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-3: chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dpag tu med pa skye zhing rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-7: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-8: tshad med pas de'i tshad gang gis kyang dpag par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-9: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang tshad med pas gang gis kyang de'i tshad dpag par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-13: rgya mtsho chen por 'bab cing 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-14: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chos kyi phyag rgyar 'jug par 'gyur bas de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-15: chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas chos rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar zhugs par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-16: phyag rgya 'dis chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgya dang mtshungs par mthong bas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-18: dper na; klu chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-19: klu'i 'khor lus chen po dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:220b-20: rgya mtsho dang ldan zhing rgya mtshor 'jug par nus pas rgya mtsho chen po de dag la gnas su byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-0: @221a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du theg pa rnams legs par bsgoms pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'dir 'jug par nus shing phyag rgya'i sgo 'di nyid la gnas par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon du bya ba'i phyir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa legs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgo de lta bu dag mngon par sgrub par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi sgo 'di nan tan gyis sgrub par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-4: chos thams cad kyi sgo la yang dag par slob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-5: chos kyi sgo rnams chos kyi sgo 'dir 'du bar mthong ba'i phyir chos kyi snang ba rnams bskyed nas chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-9: rin po che chen po rnams 'du ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-10: ting nge 'dzin 'di yang de bzhin du chos thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221a-11: chos la thabs mkhas pa rnams 'du ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-0: sems can gang la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ting @221b nge 'dzin 'di yongs su gsol bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-1: yongs su tshol bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-2: yongs su tshol bar byed pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-3: chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa'i shes rab thams cad yongs su tshol bar byed pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-4: don de'i phyir ngas chos kyi phyag rgya 'di khyed la gtad pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-5: khyod kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la yang dag pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i tshe chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis sems can rnams la yongs su gdab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-6: chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis gang la btab par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-7: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pas myur du byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-9: bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-10: sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la rjes su mthun par gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-12: bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:221b-13: lha dang mi rnams kyang yang dag pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la gzung bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu yongs su spyad par 'dod pa des chos zab mo 'di la nan tan gyis bslab par bya zhing @222a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-1: pag yod pa dang ldan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-2: gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-4: sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-11: dge ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-13: yid dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-14: bskal pa de'i sems can rnams tshe ring zhing tshe'i tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-15: rab tu bde zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-16: dge ba'i chos la rab tu gnas pas de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dge ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yangs shing rgya che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-18: shin tu mdzes pas mthong ba rnams yid bde zhing dga' bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-19: spos kyi ngad dang ldan pas kun tu khyab par byed pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de yid dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222a-20: de'i tshe gling bzhi las gling gsum gyi tshad mnyam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-0: dpag tshad @222b brgyad khri brgyad khri yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-1: gling re re na yang grong khyer nyi khri nyi khri yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-2: grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-4: dpag tshad bye ba yod do; ;de na grong khyer brgyad khri yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-5: grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu nyi shu yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-6: de dag kyang gzhal med khang brtsegs ma dang ra bas 'khor bar bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-7: gos sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-8: ro sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-9: me tog sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-10: rin po che'i shing ta la dag gis rab tu brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-11: yul bde zhing mis rab tu gang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-12: de nas grong khyer mchog tu che ba dpag tshad brgyas 'khor ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-13: de yang skyes mos tshal nyi khris 'khor bar bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-14: skyed mos tshal de kun du yang 'bab chu dag rab tu 'bab cing me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-15: 'bras bu dag rab tu rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-16: spos mchog dam pa'i ngad ldang bas yid dga' bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-18: ri dvags rnams sgra snyan pa 'byin pas rab tu gang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-19: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de skyed mos tshal de gcig tu zhugs nas 'khor rnams la chos bstan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po'i sku tshe'i tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:222b-22: bskal pa chung du bcu thub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-1: las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dag pa'i chos ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-2: bskal pa chung du gcig gi bar du 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa des 'khor 'dus pa lan bzhir chos bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-4: 'khor 'dus pa re re la yang nyan thos slob pa'i sa la gnas pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga lnga yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-7: bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga bcu lnga bcu yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-8: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-12: dpa' bo'i stobs zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-14: bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-16: chos ji lta bu zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig gi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223a-18: 'di yang dag par bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-0: byang chub @223b sems dpa' de gnyis kyis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-1: chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-3: chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-5: 'od zer chen po bkye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-6: tshangs pa'i sgra shin tu gya nom pa bsgrags nas sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i chos bstan cing yongs su smin par byas pas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-8: khyed bskal pa brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-9: bskal pa re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga brgya la mchod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dus bar mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:223b-12: dus tha mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par yongs su bzung nas sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-0: bskal pa re rer yang sems rtse gcig tu gyur cing rnam par g-yeng ba med pas @224a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-1: skye ba thams cad du yang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-2: skye ba thams cad du yang ting nge 'dzin las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi chos ston pas sems can mang po rnams yongs su bzla bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-3: bskal pa brgya 'das nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba la mchod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-4: rim gro byas pas ting nge 'dzin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-6: rnam par thar pa tshad med pa rnams la rnam par rtsen par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe gcig gi ming ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-9: mya ngan med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-11: rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rjes su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams btul te sheg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-13: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das @224b pa'i 'og tu rab tu gnas pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa re re thub par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang yon tan tshad med pa bsags pa las mngon par grub pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lung bstan pa thob pas rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'dod pas rab tu dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-8: brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas lus dang srog la phangs pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-9: bag yod pas mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:224b-10: de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos @225a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-1: thams cad kyi ye shes la thabs mkhas pa thob par bgyi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par gsungs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-5: gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-6: gdon mi 'tshal bar chos rnams kyi tshul la thabs mkhas pa thob nas myur du byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-7: yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu ma mchis pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-8: rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mthong zhing nan tan gyis chos yang dag par mngon par sgrub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-9: dge 'dun dang spyod pa mtshungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-10: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225a-14: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du don gyi blo gros /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225b-0: byang chub sems @225b dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225b-1: yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa tshad med pa rnams rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225b-2: gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225b-3: chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la thabs mkhas pas gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225b-7: ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna tshogs las mngon par grub pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225b-8: rgya mtsho chen po las dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gis gyen du 'phags shing mchog tu gsal bar gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'dis legs par gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir chos kyi gter gyi rgya mtsho chen po thams cad las mngon par 'phags nas lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bla na med pa'i gnas pas mchog tu gsal bar gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:225b-13: skar ma'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin @226a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-1: du lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad du rab tu gsal bar gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-3: khyod kyis chos 'di thos par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-4: 'di la su yang mi dga' zhing mos pa mi skye ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-6: bag yod pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med par blta bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-7: sems can bsod nams chung zhing dman pa la mos pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-9: sems can gang shes rab chen po dang ldan pa dag gis ni; chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par sgrub par byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-10: chos rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-11: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-12: ngas ji skad du gang gis chos kyi nor rgya chen po 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-13: lha dang mi rnams kyis yongs su srung zhing rim gro byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226a-14: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rjes su dgongs par 'gyur ro; ;zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal @226b to; ;blo gros mtha' yas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub cing slob par byed pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-2: sems can rnams la phan par byed cing the tshom thams cad rab tu sel ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-3: mdud pa thams cad rab tu dgrol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-4: bag chags rnams spong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-5: bag la nyal ba rnams gcod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-6: sred pa'i dga' ba rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-7: sred pa'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par brgal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-8: mun nag rnams gtan du bsal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-9: skrag cing 'jigs pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-11: sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'od zer chen po bkye bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-13: 'od zer des 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gsal bar mdzad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-14: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:226b-15: 'od zer bkye nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;blo gros mtha' yas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rdzu @227a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-1: 'phrul chen po rab tu ston cing 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-2: sengge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas chos 'di yang dag par ston par byed pas khams gsum las yang dag par 'das shing snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-3: deng nga ji lta ba bzhin pas bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-6: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'thob par 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir yang 'od zer chen po rab tu bkye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-8: gzhan yang phyag sor gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rab tu g-yo par mdzad pas sems can rnams bde ba chen po thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-9: de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227a-16: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis lha'i me tog dam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-0: lha'i gos dam pa @227b dag gis mngon par gtor nas dus gcig tu lha'i rol mo rnams byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-1: lha tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i gos rgyang nas mngon par gtor nas nam mkha' kun tu gang bar gyur te skad mthun par 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-2: kye ma sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-4: gang gis chos zab mo 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-5: sems can thams cad kyis gus par mchod cing phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-9: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can de dag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-11: ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa 'di thos par mi 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-12: sems can gang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-13: tshogs chen po yongs su sdud pa gang yin pa de dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos 'di thos par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-14: chos 'di la gang gis nan tan du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-15: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:227b-17: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po byung ba'i tshe nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la sogs pa la yongs su gtad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228a-1: pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi gter rab tu bsags pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228a-2: dpag tu med pa'i bde ba thob pa gang yin pa de dag khyod kyis kyang thob par 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228a-3: sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad khyod kyis rab tu spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228a-4: yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228a-6: khyim bdag ma smad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228a-7: tshong dpon bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228a-9: bdag cag rnams mthu ci mchis pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub chen po'i chos yongs su bzung nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sems can rnams la phan gdags par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dug pa'i stan las langs te me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas lus kyi gos mchog dam pa phud de mchod pa byas @228b nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-4: sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-6: slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar smon lam 'debs lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-7: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-8: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-9: sems can thams cad kun la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-10: phan pa chen po bya pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-11: nga yi byang chub chos bzung nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-12: chos rgyal sengge'i sgra sgrog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-13: ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-14: gang zhig chos ni yongs tshol pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-15: rgya chen chos 'di thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-16: thams cad bde ba thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-17: ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-18: gang gis theg pa 'di mthong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-19: mdo sde'i chos 'di thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-20: ji ltar mos pa'i bde ba 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-21: blo dang ldan pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-22: thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-23: chos mchog 'di ni thos gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:228b-24: lus dang sems ni rab bder 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-2: chos 'di thos par gyur nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-3: rab tu dga' ba gang bskyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-4: ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-5: khyod kyis bsod nams tshad med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-6: phung po dag ni rab bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-8: ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-9: chos rjes rab tu gsungs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-11: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-12: ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-13: nga yi byang chub chos 'dzin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-14: de ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-17: sems can tshad med pa snyed ni; dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-22: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-23: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsigs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229a-24: go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-002:229b-1: lo tstsha ba 'gos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur pa'o //
